1.content:
Sam was extremely tired after such a long day. Eight hours of school followed by three hours of football practice had worked the kid to death. Sam was a pretty average seventeen year old American teen. He stood six feet tall, weighed two hundred pounds and had shaggy brown hair. Sam walked into his house just minutes after leaving dinner with his girlfriend Amy. Amy was the love of his life. She stood five foot nine weighed one hundred and twenty pounds and was the sexiest girl at his high school. She had perfect c-cup breasts, a tight ass, and knew how to flaunt her body.

Sam walked into his house and noticed that no one was home. Sam's parents often worked late and were rarely home before 11 p.m. Sam went upstairs to his room and turned on his computer. Sam, like any American kid, open his facebook page and began surfing around. Sam then opened another tab and began working on his homework. About fifteen minutes into his homework, a message popped up on his facebook page. Sam chuckled as he immediately realized that the message was from his best friend Zach. Zach was a year older than Sam and the two had been friends since they both began playing football in Middle School.

The IM read :Dude! What are you doing right now?

Sam:I'm working on my homework.

Zach: Get your ass over to the Silver Cat right now!

Sam: The strip club?

Zach: You bet your ass. I got in and I bet I can get you in too! Turns out that Miss Sampson the black girls volleyball coach works here! She's giving me a fricken lap dance!

Sam:Awesome bro! Only problem is I have homework to do.

Zach: Fine dude. Its your loss

Sam closed the message and chuckled. Sam continued to work on his homework and after finishing it Sam turned on his T.V. On the news was the local news was a story about an exchange student at your school Georgina Languna. She was from Brazil and Sam had to admit that she was an extremely beautiful lady. The news story also noted that Georgina was staying with his best friend Zach. Zach's mom was on the television and Sam had to admit that she was looking good. Zach's mom looked like the character Sandra Bullock portrayed in the Blind Side. She had great legs and a perfect ass.

Sam finished the night by watching a football game on ESPN and slowly drifted to sleep.

Sam was suddenly awoken by a bright light that shone through his window. Sam tried to move when he saw it, but despite his efforts he couldn't move. Suddenly Sam felt himself being lifted into the air and he passed out. Sam was awoken by the sounds of a familiar voice, "Sam! Sam wake up!" Sam then felt a jerk on his shoulders and his eyes opened. He was greeted by the familiar face of his girlfriend Amy. She looked embarrased as she was now dressed in a white tank top and some sexy pink panties. "Amy. What...whats going on?" Amy replied, "I don't know! But half the town is here." Sam looked around the room he was now in and immediately recognized many of the people around him. Sam saw his friend Zach standing with his mom, the exchange student Georgina, Miss Sampson, and various other people from his town.

Suddenly a metallic voice rang out into the all white room, "Do not fear! You are all now part of a social experiment. You will soon be returned to your homes." Another white light washed over Sam and he once again passed out.

Sam awoke in a terrible sweat. He felt like he had just woken from a terrible nightmare. Sam got out of bed and walked into his bathroom to take his morning piss. After Sam finished his piss he walked to his sink and noticed something around his neck. Up near where his neck met his head there was a smooth shiny metal collar that had not lock. It was a single seamless ring that had not flaws. Sam rubbed the smoothness of the collar and began to try to pull it off. Despite Sam's best efforts he couldn't remove the ring. Sam then remembered his dream and quickly got dressed and headed towards his girlfriend's house.

Sam got into his car and quickly sped to his girlfriends house. When Sam got there he knocked on the door and was greeted by Amy's father Tom. To Sam's amazement Tom too had a collar around his neck. Sam immediately went to question Tom but the thought running through his head (You have a collar too!) came out as, "How are you doing this morning? Is Amy here?" Tom yelled upstairs for Amy and Amy came downstairs dressed in a short denim mini-skirt, high heeled boots, and a sexy victoria's secret top that showed off her cleavage. Sam also noticed that Amy too had a collar around her neck.

Amy's dad left the two of you standing outside and you once again tried to ask about the collar, but all that came out was, "You ready for school sweetie?" Amy smiled grabbed a hold of your hand and the two of you walked towards your car. Suddenly you noticed something was wrong with Amy's face. It seemed that Amy's face was beginning to digitize. It reminded you of a scene from Charlie and the Chocolate factory was her head slowly digitized into nothing. You tried to scream but noticed that your head too was digitizing. Soon enough you blacked out. Suddenly your vision returned and you were....
1.title: Abduction and aftermath

choices: Tried different ways to communicate with Miss Sampson I.E. Text or writing
Tried sending a text message to Zach
11.content:
Sam's vision slowly returned and his consciousness returned. The best way to describe the feeling was that of passing your hand through a jell-o like substance. When Sam fully regained his sight he saw the familiar surroundings of Amy's driveway. Sam took a breath of relief now knowing that nothing had happened. When he looked to his left however he almost collapsed in shock. Standing next to him was a black woman that he instantly recognized as Miss Sampson. The only problem was that Miss Sampson now had Sam's body from the neck down. Sam's began to scream when he noticed that something was off with his voice. It was higher pitched and he recognized the sound as Amy's voice.

Sam, with a look of terror in his eyes, down below his neck and was greeted by his girlfriend's body. Sam looked down at his pink top that now showed off his cleavage. Sam then ran his new dainty hands down his smooth sides down to the mini denim skirt that he was now wearing. His hands trembled as he moved them towards his new shapely back-side. Sam then looked towards Miss Sampson and wanted to say, "Miss Sampson what happened to us?" but all that came out was, "Sam. When we get done with school you are going to be in for a big surprise!" The voice that came out was Amy's sweet sexy tone that she only gave you when she wanted to "explore" your body.

Miss Sampson then smiled at you and in your own voice said, "That sounds like a good deal sweetie." Miss Sampson climbed into what was your car and you followed suit not knowing what else to do. Once in the car Sam...
11.title: Still standing in the driveway

choices: ...he was distracted by an odd sight at a crosswalk.
111.content:
Sam, his head still quite attached to his sexy girlfriend Amy's body below the strange metal collar on his neck, was having a Hell of a time grasping what exactly was happening to him. He glanced down at his new body, formerly Amy's in utter bewilderment.

The same amazing set of knockers he had grown to love to cop a feel of on a frequent basis strained against the fabric of Amy's pink top. He could see and feel Amy's amazing legs, crossed beneath him and shown to their usual effect by her tiny denim mini-skirt. He could even feel the leather of her high heeled boots on her feet! His head was unmistakably on Amy's body now!

Even worse, that very body was behaving just like Amy normally would. He had grown to love the drive to school with his girlfriend over the past several months. He always had a hard time keeping his eyes on the road as she crossed and uncrossed her legs and fiddled with her nails. He adored watching her as he chauffeured. He certainly had no idea he would ever be watching one of her "performances" from this angle!

Looking over to his left he was just as confused to see his own original, teenage, male body doing just what it always did on those daily drives to school as well. His familiar hands worked the steering wheel as his feet worked the pedals. Sam would've thought he was looking in a mirror if it weren't for the fact that Miss Sampson's black, female head was sitting atop his shoulders on a collar just like the one he had on.

Sam looked at the woman's eyes and was sure that she was just as confused and frightened as he was. But, she seemed just as helpless as he was. Her new body continued driving the car just as it always did every other morning. He tried to force himself to speak to her, but, when he tried to say, "Miss Sampson! What's happening to us!?!?" all that came out was Amy's sexy girlish voice saying, "How long is your football practice tonight Sammy-kins?"

Miss Sampson turned and looked at you, her eyes traveling up Amy's body before locking with your own. "I don't think it will run too long babe. Coach is pretty happy with us these days." His own voice answered him.

Sam wanted to shout at her, to signal, something; but he couldn't do anything but sit there primping. He could move in ways he wanted to, scratch here and there, but, if he didn't concentrate totally his body shifted into some kind of auto-pilot and would act like Amy. Sam closed his eyes and grunted in frustration. How and why was this happening?!?!

Suddenly, Sam had an idea! Concentrating on making Amy's body do what he wanted to, he forced her delicate hands to reach down into her purse. With great strain, he retrieved Amy's cell phone and started typing in a text message to his own phone! The message read, "Miss Sampson! Are you still yourself? Do you know what's happening?!?!"

Sam's phone gave off it's familiar ring as his body automatically pulled his phone from the center console so that Miss Sampson' her head still on the boy's shoulders, could answer and read her latest text. As the black woman read the message Sam could see the tell-tale signs of understanding and a flash of hope emerge on her face. Her brow furrowed in concentration, Miss Sampson typed back a message and sent it.

Amy's own phone in Sam's hands, (or was that Amy's!?!?) gave a beep as he forced her fingers to hit the receive button. "Yes! I'm me! Except for being you! I have no idea what's happening Sam! I had a weird dream last night, woke up with this collar on my neck, felt odd, and the next thing I know I'm you! How did our head's get here?!?"

Before Sam could reply...
111.title: Tried different ways to communicate with Miss S...

1111.content:
As Sam's former male body, with Miss Sampson's head resting on top of it, pulled into the high school parking lot Sam was greeted by some odd sights. He looked over to the spot where he and his friends would normally be and saw some strange sights. His best friend Zach now had the head of a little five year old girl with pig-tails, and standing next to him dressed in her cheerleader uniform was the body of Zach's girlfriend Chloe. The only problem was that Chloe's body now had the head of an elderly man who looked like he was at least eighty.

When Miss Sampson parked what was once Sam's car she looked over to him and said in his baritone voice, "Good luck on your test today baby." and began leaning towards Sam and puckering her lips for a kiss. You responded in what was once your girlfriends sweet luscious tone, "You're the best boyfriend this girl can have." and proceeded to make out with Miss Sampson. During the long exchange Sam was completely freaked out by what was happening, yet the hormones of Amy's body made him feel great.

Sam and Miss Sampson broke their exchange and Sam grabbed Amy's purse and began strutting across the parking lot. Sam had never walked in high heels before, but by the way he was striding across the parking lot with his new tight ass working its way back and forth, not a single person could tell. As Sam made his way into the school building he was greeted by even stranger sights. Goth girls with the heads of five year old boys and teachers with the heads of students. By his calculation Sam concluded that at least half the people in the school of 500 had had their heads switched.

As Amy's body made its way into her first class of Econ, Sam saw a reassuring yet disturbing sight. Luckily Sam had found Amy. The only problem was that Amy's head was attached to Sam's football buddy John's body. John stood about 6'5 and weighed close to 300 pounds. Desperate to communicate with her, Sam reached into Amy's purse and search desperately to find John's number. Unfortunately he couldn't find it and the bell rang for class...
1111.title: ...they arrived at school.

11111.content:
Sam, along for the ride as Amy's body sauntered into the Econ class, looked around the room in awe. As often as he had seen the collars and their handiwork today, he was still shocked and more than a little afraid to see the bizarre changes they had wrought.

Half of the students, while wearing the collars as he was, hadn't had their heads swapped around. They looked almost as confused and horrified as he and the other "swapees", but, looked as if they were being forced to go about their normal routines as well.

Sam felt Amy's body strut over to what was apparently her desk. The strange center of gravity and sway of his girlfriend's hips beneath him was totally alien to him; but, he had to admit in his heart of hearts that it felt more than a little thrilling. He could feel her smooth long legs and the chill of the room's air on them. He could feel her toes being forced down into the pointed boots of her ridiculous high heeled boots. He could feel the slight jiggle of her breasts with each clicking step. He was sure he was feeling what Amy felt every day of her life.

As Sam sat Amy's rump down in her seat, he absentmindedly crossed her legs and pulled a nail file out of her purse. His new hands began to file away at Amy's nails as he gazed around at his fellow students.

To his left, he could see Daria Bradley. More accurately, he could see Daria Bradley's body. The petite, goth teenager's pale little form was wearing a pair of black lace up heeled boots, a long black skirt with a slit, and a tiny lace trimmed black tank top. Sam had always thought she was hot in a Morticia Addams kind of way. However, where Daria's pale, cute face framed by dark hair would have normally sat upon the top of a metal collar just like his; the confused face of Mr. Deedle the assistant principal rested.

Glancing in front of her, Sam was just as in awe of what had become of Peter Yates. Yates, a thin, preppy, student-council suck-up, had had his blonde hair blue eyed head replaced with the chubby cheeked face of Torrie Needemyer; one of the band geeks.

Sam glanced to his left and locked eyes with a equally wide-eyed Jason Parker. Parker, a funny, slightly chunky kid with a bushy head of brown hair and thick rimmed glasses was looking over Sam and his new body. His brow furrowed as he tried to say something to Sam, but all that came out was. "M-morning Amy. Did you study for the quiz today?'

Sam, with Amy's sexy voice found himself answering. "Not really. I can't stand wasting half my evening with such boring crap." Thinking quickly, Sam forced Amy's hands to pick up a pen and started to write a note out on some of her notebook paper. Finishing up he passed it over to Jason.

The note read, "You haven't switched with anyone? Do you know why? Do you know anything about what's going on?"

Jason hurriedly wrote out a reply, his face contorted with the effort of forcing himself to do so. He passed it over as Sam used Amy's slender, feminine fingers to open it up. "No to both questions! I woke up with this thing on my neck and started seeing what had happened to all of you guys as I headed to school. I'd freak out if I could, but I can't control myself!"

Sam was about to write a reply out when...
11111.title: A very weird class

111111.content:
Sam's eyes darted over to the door as he and the rest of the class heard it opening. In stepped their teacher Mrs Karen Wilkes, normally an attractive 35-year old mother of two with shoulder length blonde, wavy hair. Her body was dressed in her usual outfit of a white blouse, a navy-colored pant suit and black 2-inch heeled pumps, but atop of that familiar body was the head of a boy no older than eight.

"Okay class, stop the chattering please" the confused boy said in Mrs Wilkes' dulcet tone.

"Amy...if you'd be so kind as to put the nail file down, this isn't a beauty salon" the young boy then stated.

Sam meant to apologize, but all that left his mouth in his girlfriend's voice was..."Jeez, can't a girl keep her nails tidy?"

Mrs Wilkes' body put its hands on its hips as though annoyed by Sam's response, but the facial expression the young boy (who now possessed her body from the neck down) had certainly wasn't showing 'annoyance'. The boy seemed to be genuinely scared about what was happening.

"No sass from you young lady" the boy told Sam in his teacher's voice.

"And Chloe...unless you're going school work, please refrain from writing in my class" the boy then said, glancing over at the elderly man who now had his head attached to Chloe's sexy body, clad in her cheerleader's outfit.

"Sorry!" the old man apologized in Chloe's voice, making Sam wince at hearing it.

"This is all wrong!" he thought to himself.
111111.title: ...the teacher arrived.

1111111.content:
Despite half of the class and teacher having had their heads exchanged with other random people, the rest of the class proceeded as Sam would have guessed it would have on any other day. He remembered Amy saying her Econ class was major-league-boring, and now he was in total agreement with her.

Mrs. Wilkes, or rather, Mrs. Wilkes's body with some young boy's head attached droned on and on about various market and economic theories for what seemed like an eternity. Her body walked back and forth, stopping periodically to write some point up on the chalk board. As it did so, the poor kid who's head had been affixed to her neck looked around at the students with a confused, frightened expression on his face.

Sam looked around at the other pupils and saw the same upset expressions written on all of their faces as well; including those who hadn't had their head's transplanted by the collars.

Looking back up at the front of the room, Sam was surprised to see that the boy who was now Mrs. Wilkes was again writing on the chalkboard. However, instead of some odd fact about supply and demand he had forced Mrs. Wilkes's hand to write what he wanted it to. "Help me!!! I don't want to be a lady!!!" he wrote in a ragged scrawl.

"Join the club kid." Sam thought to himself.

At almost the same instant, the bell rang out. Sam felt Amy's body stand up and teeter on her heels as it gathered up her books and purse. "Well at least I don't have to hear about Econ anymore." Sam thought to himself.
1111111.title: The class continues.

choices: Things take a turn for the better
11111112.content:
Timothy Anderson was living a nightmare that just wouldn't end. It started some time after he went to bed. A bright light seemingly woke him up, but he couldn't move his body. He could look around and see that about half the town was in a large circular room standing stiffly and muttering to each other, only to be told by a metallic voice that they were part of a social experiment and would soon be returned to their homes.

After another flash of bright light he found himself back in his bed and was going to tell his mother about the nightmare he had, when she came in to wake him up for school, when he noticed she had a metallic collar on that he never saw before. Although her eyes looked worried, even panicky, she spoke and acted as if everything was normal. Worse, he couldn't tell her anything about the nightmare he just had. Weirder still, when he was brushing his teeth, he noticed that he was also wearing a collar.

At breakfast he saw that his five year old twin siblings, Jack and Jill, and even his ten month old baby brother Kyle also had collars. He fully expected to see his dad wearing one too if he hadn't left early for work. All except Kyle looked worried but were unable to say anything about their experience last night. Everyone acted the same, talked about some stupid show the twins liked (Timmy hated Dora the Explorer) mom made Timmy's bagged lunch, changed Kyle's diaper and ushered the kids into the minivan as if everything was normal. They were just pulling out of the driveway when something even stranger started happening. Timmy noticed that something weird was happening to his mom's head, like it was being turned into tiny Lego blocks. Then he noticed the same thing happening to him. He couldn't see his siblings horrified reaction behind him, although he did hear them continuing their non-stop arguement of "Am not!" and "Are too" just before his vision completely faded out.

Then his vision started fading in again, but he was no longer looking at his mother. He was staring into the horrified face of Tobey Wilkes, the class bully. He seemed to end up in a completely different car, allthough at his school oddly enough. Stranger still, he was sitting in the drivers seat and the seat belt felt real weird across his chest. Tobey also seemed a lot smaller than he remembered him. Timmy was actually looking down at him a little. On top of it all his cloethes and even his hands were completely different. Timmy wanted to scream and demand how Tobey had done this. Instead he calmly said "You have a good day in school today sweetheart." And kissed Tobey on the cheek. To which the terrified Tobey responded with "Thanks mommy. "Seeya after school." And lightly hopped out of the car as if nothing was out of the ordinary.

Timmy wanted to jump out of the car too. Instead he waved to the (now literally) little bully checked over his shoulder (catching a quick glimpse of some surprised and mismatched head and body people) waved to Tobey, put the car into gear and drove off into traffic.

Ordinarily Timmy would have been thrilled to drive, but he had absolutely no control of his (?!?) body. When glancing about to his uncertain destination he saw more confused and mismatched people. But only about half of them though. Timmy reluctantly had to acknowledge whose body he had below his neck. He wanted to cry but was too stunned to do so. Finally he pulled up to another school which he recognized as the local high school. He effortlessly backed the car into a parking space with the sign "Mrs. Wilkes" written on it.

Timmy finally climbed out of the car grabbing his briefcase and purse and discovered his body wore black two inch pumps along with the a navy coloured pant suit and white blouse. He had no problem walking in them and walked into the school past an assemblage of students and teachers all of whom possessed the same disbelieving look but only half of which possessed a mismatched body. He could immediately tell they were mismatched as all the girl bodies had boys heads and vice versa. What is happening here?. He thought to himself.

In the teachers lounge he fixed himself a coffee (cream with no sugar -- blech!!!) he spent the next little while before class discussing some nonsense about economics and a difficult student with a high school boy with red hair who possessed a rather old and frumpy woman's body from the neck down. Both of them sounded like the women their heads sat on and completely avoided talking about what was really on their minds.

Timmy then found himself going to a class and even lecturing the horrified students on economics. At one point he tried to write a note on the wall begging for help, but got no response from his students.

Walking out of the class he was approached by a fifteen year old girl who sported the head of a bearded and bald man. "Mrs. Wilkes, could I speak to you in private?" He/she said. And then in a lower voice "One of the teachers sent me a picture on my phone of his ...junk! "I don't know what to do." Timmy didn't know what to do either, but he found himself saying "Here, let's go into this empty classroom where we can talk freely."

Once inside the girl took out an iPad from her bag and showed the increasingly disturbed Timmy something he really didn't expect. It was a website. In the search engine were a series of odd symbols, numbers and letters. The man-girl in a very cool and authoritative manner told Timmy to "If you want to save yourself, your family and maybe even the World, you must press enter." Timmy felt something he never thought he'd feel ever again,hope, and he pressed "Enter".
11111112.title: ...continue with boy/Mrs. Wilkes.

111111121.content:
Timmy felt an electrical pulse through his collar and immediately realized he was in control of his (!?!) body again. He looked at the strange man-girl and asked (to his surprise, still with Mrs Wilkes' voice) "What happened? "What's going on? "Uh, who are you?"

The man-girl allowed himself a slight smile and with a tone of relief in his feminine voice answered "I am Professor Willard Fassbinder, head of the Astro Radiological Research Department of State University. "I've been tracking unusual radiation signatures that had their origins from outside our solar system, coming from a Brown Dwarf star four light years away. "I've tracked the movement of the specific energy bands as they've moved into our solar system and was astonished to discover that they were resonating in the electronic devices here in your town several days before the arrival of their ...ship, I suppose. "That is why I already had a lab set up in your town when everyone in it was abducted, including myself, and had this damnable collar placed on."

"But how were you able to break the aliens control?" The dulcet tones of Mrs Wilkes' voice asked "I did just ask that and not Mrs Wilkes?" Timmy followed up to his relief.

"Well, ...I'm sorry, what is your name little boy?"

"Oh, it's Timmy, Timmy Anderson." Mrs Wilkes voice responded.

"Well Timmy. "When we were all restored to our point of origin after the initial abduction I naturally enough found myself back in my lab researching the exact same radiation as before. "I tried contacting the authorities, by phone and in person, even handing them written prepared statements, all to no effect except in written correspondence, electronic or on paper. "But even then, only within the town. "I couldn't call out or even drive out as any effort forced me back to my lab. "It was there that I discovered a strange anomaly in the radiation signature that was operating through every wi-fi device in the community and wrote a program that would disrupt a specific signal on a limited band. "You just triggered that disruptive signal when you pressed enter on my iPad"

"Can we do that for everyone Professor?" Timmy asked.

"I hope so Timmy. "I need to conduct some more experiments on my own. "Including finding a way to get us back to our original bodies and ultimately removing these collars. "Not to mention dealing with the aliens so they never do this again ...or worse."

"Can I go home to help my mom brothers and sister Professor?"

"Not just yet Timmy. "You being in the position of an authority figure could help in the next stage of my experiments. "I would like you to write out on the board of the classroom the website you found on my iPad and the word you found in the search engine when you pressed enter. "Do you remember them? "I tried to keep it as simple as possible so that anyone with the most basic reading and writing skills could repeat it."

"Writing.com." Timmy answered enthusiastically. "And the search engine said "Tagged."

"That's good Timmy. "Let's hope we don't crash the servers though. "I'm sorry to put you at risk, but it is for the greater good. "This town is on its own. "People passing through without the collar don't notice anything different because the collars emit a hypnotic pulse that makes them think all is normal. People from the town can travel (except myself, and presumably you now too) and are again not perceived as being different." I wonder if it's a glitch or some bizarre game the aliens are playing. "I intend to find out."

Timmy looked down at himself (herself?) touching his boobies and asked "So I have to keep being the lady?"

"For a while Timmy. "Although I suspect there might be more group and random switches happening as part of the aliens own experiments. "When that happens, try to find a computer or smart phone and go to the website and enter "Tagged" into the search engine. "You might have to do this until you're restored to your own body, by which time I hope to have an additional code to remove the collars. "God help those who actually die before that happens."

Timmy nodded and moved tentatively towards the door, his heels clicking as he did so. Hesitating a bit he looked down at him(her)self and then open mouthed at the professor in anticipation of another question.

"That's right Timmy. "You're walking naturally in her body. "It's called "muscle memory" and should help you to do things a little boy wouldn't ordinarily know how to do, such as driving, firing a gun, cooking or ...other things, which I hope you don't have to do before we get things back to normal. "One other thing. "I'll be leaving any updates on the "Tagged" story chapters, so check there regularly if there's new code to help you escape your collar. "And try to act like the body you're in as if you still don't control it. "Otherwise you might end up being locked up in a psychiatric ward, or worse, on the aliens dissection table. "Good luck."

Timmy took a deep breath, grasped the door with his elegant hand and stepped out into the now empty hallway. He felt scared, but not as much as before he entered the room. Walking in the direction of the teachers lounge he weighed his options. Should he continue to pretend to be Mrs Wilkes? Should he just go home and pray for the best? If so. His or hers? Should he make a run for it and try to get the army? His head was still mulling this when he stepped into the teachers lounge.

"Mrs Wilkes." A man's voice rang out. "Would you be so kind as to join me at my table please." The person who said that had the body of an overweight man in a business suit of about fifty who must have weighed close to three hundred pounds. The head atop it was that of a blonde five year old girl who was as wide eyed as Timmy imagined himself to be for most of this morning. "I would like to have the opportunity to ask you to chaperone the upcoming prom as I neglected to send any memos to the effect earlier." Timmy joined the girl-man, who promptly sat after the apparent lady did and continued, "You're one of my most effective teachers in maintaining discipline in our more irresponsible students. "I shudder to think what would happen without you present." The face of the stressed girl laughed.

"Uh, yes ...sir. "I guess I'd be glad to do that." And Timmy fished into his(?) purse and fished out the smart phone he was looking for. About to worry about not knowing the pass code, his borrowed fingers automatically hit the magic numbers.

"Is everything alright Mrs Wilkes? "You don't seem to be yourself this morning." Eliciting a quick glance from Timmy. Was she trying to be funny?

Timmy finished his typing and pushed the smart phone towards the little girl-man. "Could you please press enter on this website? "I really need to show you this."

The confused girl picked up the phone, "Mrs Wilkes, is this the best place to discuss what I assume to be a misdeed of one of your students on the Internet? "I can't imagine what..." And she pressed the button.
111111121.title: Things take a turn for the better

choices: Two heads are better than one!
1111111211.content:
“Eeeeeeeee, I want my mommy!” The girl-Man cried in the principals baritone voice. “I don wanna be no grownup no more!” She continued sobbing to Timmy’s horror (but not surprise).

Timmy and the girl-man both stood up, with Timmy having enough sense to also grab Mrs Wilkes’ cell phone, quickly putting it back into his/her purse. The other teachers also stood and came over to enquirer as to what was going on. The first to offer arrive was the body of the Home Ec teacher, Mrs willows, a shapely mother of forty with three kids who possessed an eye-catching hourglass figure reminiscent of Joan Holloway of Mad Men fame. She also liked to wear tight dresses to show off that figure in a tasteful manner, with the days ensemble consisting of a tight floral pattern blue and green skirt suit with matching blue three inch heels. Unfortunately her body at the moment was sporting the head of a six year old freckle-faced red-headed boy who just lost his first tooth. Despite suspecting he would ordinarily speak with a hint of a whistle, the boy instead spoke with a soothing motherly tone with a hint of alarm in it. “Mr Weathers, what’s wrong?” The boy-woman asked with utter horror displayed on his face. To which the ersatz Mr Weathers reiterated “Mommy, I want my mommy!”

info.brief_description: Aliens begin tagging a local community with collars
info.description:
Aliens arrive and focus on a small town. During the night, the extraterrestrials abduct and look over random townspeople. When they put them back, the people awaken the next day to find strange technological collars around their necks. The collars will allow the aliens to monitor and track the wearer.

The people find that they cannot remove the collars. More than that, they discover that the collar has a strange telepathic effect on the wearers and those around them. No matter how much they try, the people cannot discuss the collar. This goes for those who wear them, and those who don't and notice them. In fact, when they try to, they find themselves unable to speak. A few try and call the authorities, finding themselves unable to dial the phone when they go to contact them. The collar monitors the wearer and those around them, and telepathically blocks them from acknowledging their presence.

The people who are collared are like animals in national parks who are tagged by forestry service agents.

As bizarre as this is, it is only the beginning. After a while, the collars begin to do strange things to those who wear them. Completely at random, the collars dematerialize and exchange the wearers' heads. Suddenly, one person finds their head now switched with that of another collar wearer's.

The telepathic properties of the collar begin to act in another way. The wearer is forced to live the life of the body they now find themselves on. The collared person must do as the person who's body he now has would normally do, to the best of their ability.

Also, the person cannot panic or become upset because of their head-swapping. Those around them must also act as if this is completely normal, acknowledging only in the most basic way that their friend or family member now has another person's head. They are forced to accept that this new person will be taking over the roll of their former loved one.

The aliens are not only monitoring the people, but seeing how they would do as other members in the community, by giving them the roles each other person has. They do this by giving them each others body.
